name: Williams %R Oversold Scanner
question: Which stocks are showing Williams %R oversold reversal signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks have been beaten down but might recover?
description: Identifies stocks with Williams %R readings below -80 (severely oversold) that are beginning to reverse higher, indicating potential short-term bounce opportunities. Analyzes momentum divergences and trend context to filter high-probability reversal candidates from trending downmoves.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for Williams %R oversold screening
Step 2: Get historical price data for Williams %R calculation and trend analysis
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for oversold reversal opportunities
Step 4: Calculate Williams %R and identify oversold reversal patterns with momentum confirmation
Step 5: Rank reversal signals by momentum strength and trend support
